channel.title: All custom armor goes to sword/wepon slot click to help me?
channel.description: Now i download custom iteams and wepons work but when i add the armors like d platebody exc. it goes to my wepon slot in the game how i make it go to the right place for helmets,cape,body,legs, and boots?

item.title: All custom armor goes to sword/wepon slot click to help me?
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

you goto item.java in ur source file and add the custom item id in the right place you’ll know the place when u see it theres place’s for like plate body’s and capes

Read full topic
